duties_responsibilities.duty: Execution of the regional department strategy, including pipeline management, deal approval, P&L management, and overall department operations.
Directly supervise Heads of Departments and Business Managers, including interviewing, hiring, training, performance management, staffing, and resolving problems.
Partner with Finance Business Partner to build annual budgets, update sales forecasting, and ensure accurate financial reporting.
Participate in, lead, and manage strategic and cost management initiatives for Departments.
Develop and lead strategic initiatives, including areas for opportunity and growth.

education_certification.credential: Master’s Degree in Business Administration (MBA) or equivalent field, or an undergraduate degree with a minimum of 12 years work experience.
